statements: SELECT * FROM quizzes
SELECT quiz_name, start_date, end_date FROM quizzes
SELECT quiz_description FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_description FROM quizzes WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_quizzes FROM quizzes WHERE start_date < NOW();
SELECT quiz_name, start_date, end_date FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, quiz_description FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY quiz_name ASC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions, quiz_duration FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions > 10;
SELECT * FROM quiz_results WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY submission_time DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_score FROM quizzes q JOIN quiz_results r ON q.quiz_id = r.quiz_id WHERE r.total_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_name DESC, total_questions ASC
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions > 10
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_duration > '01:00:00'
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, total_questions FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions > 5 ORDER BY total_questions DESC
SELECT quiz_name, total_questions, quiz_duration FROM quizzes
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, start_time FROM quizzes WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT q.question_id, q.question_text, q.correct_answer, quiz.quiz_name FROM questions q INNER JOIN quizzes quiz ON q.quiz_id = quiz.quiz_id;
SELECT qa.attempt_id, qa.student_id, qa.score, q.quiz_name FROM quiz_attempts qa LEFT JOIN quizzes q ON qa.quiz_id = q.quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, start_time, end_time FROM quizzes WHERE start_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT quiz_name, count(*) AS total_questions FROM quizzes JOIN questions ON quizzes.quiz_id = questions.quiz_id GROUP BY quiz_name;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM quiz_attempts GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT q.quiz_name, q.quiz_description, qa.score FROM quizzes q JOIN quiz_attempts qa ON q.quiz_id = qa.quiz_id WHERE qa.score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT quiz_title FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 123;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 456;
SELECT quiz_title, start_time FROM quizzes WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT quiz_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM quiz_attempts GROUP BY quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT quiz_title, start_time, end_time FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT a.student_id, q.quiz_title, q.start_time, q.end_time FROM quiz_attempts a JOIN quizzes q ON a.quiz_id = q.quiz_id WHERE a.score >= 80 ORDER BY a.start_time DESC;
SELECT q.quiz_title, COUNT(*) AS num_attempts FROM quiz_attempts a JOIN quizzes q ON a.quiz_id = q.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_title HAVING num_attempts > 5;
SELECT * FROM Quiz;
SELECT quiz_name, max_score FROM Quiz WHERE max_score > 20;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Student ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM Question WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, score FROM Student INNER JOIN Submission ON Student.student_id = Submission.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Quiz;
SELECT quiz_name, max_score FROM Quiz WHERE max_score > 50;
SELECT quiz_name, max_score FROM Quiz ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, q.question_text, a.given_answer FROM Student s JOIN Answer a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN Question q ON a.question_id = q.question_id;
SELECT q.quiz_name, SUM(s.score) AS total_score FROM Quiz q JOIN Submission s ON q.quiz_id = s.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id;
